reviewText: Sumie Kouji step mother tells him and Mitsuko how she come to live in this house and be married to Kouji's father. in turn Kouji and Mitsuko tell her that they have been having an affair for months. when Sumie asks why Kouji can only tell her that he has feelings for her and he's had then since Sumie can to live at the house. in return Sumie agrees to be Kouji's for one night, Kaoru Sumie's son sees them and Sumie runs after him. Mitsuko, Sumie, and Kouji are now in a love-triangle and they look happy. but one night Kaoru comes to Kouji's room to reveal a secret.
I Got 4 now. It's good. I enjoyed them.
